mapper.select: select FA_NAME, FA_WAR from FA where FA_AGENT='FA자유계약'
select FA_POS, count(*) COUNT from FA where FA_AGENT='FA자유계약' group by FA_POS
select FA_NO, FA_NAME, FA_DATE, FA_TEAM, FA_POS, FA_WAR, FA_STATE, FA_AGENT from FA where FA_AGENT='FA자유계약'
select round(avg(FA_WAR),3) from FA where FA_STATE='TRUE'
mapper.update: UPDATE FA SET FA_STATE = CASE WHEN FA_STATE = 'FALSE' THEN 'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END WHERE FA_NO = #{FA_NO}
mapper.select: select YEAR as HIREYEAR, count(to_char(to_date(HIRE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY')) AS COUNT from EMP RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY' ) - LEVEL + 1 AS YEAR FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')+1)-2015 ) ON TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(HIRE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY') = YEAR GROUP BY YEAR ORDER BY YEAR

select YEAR as RETIREYEAR, count(to_char(to_date(RETIRE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY')) AS COUNT from EMP RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY' ) - LEVEL + 1 AS YEAR FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')+1)-2015 ) ON TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RETIRE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY') = YEAR GROUP BY YEAR ORDER BY YEAR
